item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: <<<<<<< HEAD Go to About. ======= Go to About >>>>>>> a922bdc808f58d7401f3378541349f71df4a606e R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.
